casebody.data:
Allscripts Healthcare, LLC
v.
Etransmedia Technology, Inc. 330A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 29, 2016 W. Swain Wood, Attorney at Law, Shannon R. Joseph, Attorney at Law, John T. Kivus, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Christopher Jackson, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Allscripts Healthcare, LLC. Tracie H. Brisson, Attorney at Law, for Etransmedia Technology, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 22nd of December 2016 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of December 2016."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 27th day of January 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
